name: com.ez337.ezconditions
description:
This package creates a system to enable designers and developers to create 
editor-friendly conditions on Unity Objects that can be evaluated at run time.

using EZ_Conditions namespace
Add a "ConditionManager" Component to an object and add a [Condition] Attribute to a method/property to get started.
Conditions are evaluated with OR Superiorty such that AB+CD+E results in A*(B+C)*(D+E)
